Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Thomas' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point during the outbreak, Thomas joined a community in Ohio. Thomas is present at the "Kill House" along with his fellow trainees. He is ordered to team up with Hart by Mercer .
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Thomas has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
